evidence_extraction:
```json
[
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "If you're black, you should be thinking black. And if you're black and you not thinking black at this late date, well, I'm sorry for you.",
  "They don't hang you because you're a Baptist; they hang you 'cause you're black.",
  "And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.",
  "It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "And in 1964, this seems to be the year. Because what can the white man use, now, to fool us?",
  "It's the ballot or the bullet. It's liberty or it's death.",
  "What we will be doing is developing a situation, wherein, we will actually be able to create employment for the people in the community.",
  "Before we can get a self-help program started, we have to have a self-help philosophy. Black nationalism is a self-help philosophy.",
  "But today, this country can become involved in a revolution that won't take bloodshed. All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "when you spend your dollar out of the community in which you live, the community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.",
  "And here you have 22 million Afro-Americans, black people today, catching more hell than Patrick Henry ever saw.",
  "They try and make you think they set you free by calling you a second-class citizen. No, you're nothing but a 20th century slave.",
  "We have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape. ... and he is your enemy.",
  "We suffer political oppression, economic exploitation and social degradation. All of 'em from the same enemy.",
  "So I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends...",
  "But if we keep our religion at home, keep our religion in the closet, keep our religion between ourselves and our God, but when we come out here we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom... I think that separation will get me freedom.",
  "It's the ballot or the bullet.",
  "How we gonna overcome the tendency to be at each other's throats that always exists in our neighborhood? ... We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.",
  "And once you...feel that this philosophy will solve your problem, go join any church where that's preached... join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.",
  "The gospel of black nationalism, as I told you, means you should control your own, the politics of your community, the economy of your community, and all of the society in which you live should be under your control."
]
```
